name: Circulets
summary: Circulets is a game that pits two players against each other on the same device on a fun trip to collect as many tiny colored circles - circulets, as the other player will let you. It brings a new and innovative experience to your touch devices. It is not about winning. It is about who you play with and how you chose to play. Its a simple toy that helps you explore your relationships in new ways. You have to work your way against the other player and ensure that you end up on the top.
